messages.title: CONSERVATIVE HILLINGDON FREEZES COUNCIL TAX AGAIN
messages.content: A message from Cllr. Ray Puddifoot, Leader of Hillingdon Conservatives. While other councils are raising Council Tax, reducing services and closing facilities here in Hillingdon your Conservative Administration continue to buck the national trend.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Freezing Council Tax and improving services and facilities.
Keeping all the libraries open and ensure the book stock and IT facilities match todays requirements.
Building three more Youth Centre to allow our young people the opportunity to fulfill their potential.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Hillingdon is the only authority to consistently deliver the proven management & financial ability to deliver. The tactical situation is framed by the consequence of having a major financial shortfall if administrated by politicians from other parties.

issues.education: A school place for every child
issues.environment: More Green Flag Parks than any other council
issues.health: Free burger alarms for the over 65s

housing.content: Every library, not only open but rebuilt or refurbished

politicalExperience.achievements: Managed to freeze the Council Tax and improve services and facilities.
